thread.title: DEFRANCO/ITALO

author: DEFRANCO/ITALO
title: DEFRANCO/ITALO
text:
we booked 6 tickets to Athens. Your representative told us that they were booked and then he called to say that the price had gone up by $40.00 per ticket. He said he could not get the tickets. This cause a very bad customer service. This is not good business.
P. S. first he told me the amount was in Canadian money then he charged us in U.S. money. I had to call to make the change. No good.
